text:
Can You Guess Our Latest Customer?
By Jennifer Milner|Monday, November 30, 2015

Our latest customer is one of the only insurers focused on the Garden state and is a leading health plan in that state. It has been named one of the Best Places to work by the Best Companies Group for the past four consecutive years and has its headquarters in Cranbury, NJ. By now youve probably figured out that its AmeriHealth New Jersey (AHNJ)!
Earlier in November, AHNJ announced that it selected Array Health to deliver its online private health insurance exchange solution for employers with less than 100 employees. Through the exchange  which supports employee shopping and enrollment  AHNJ will offer medical, dental, and vision plans to employees this fall for coverage effective January 1, 2016. Additional specialty products such as long-term disability, accident and voluntary life insurance will also be offered on the exchange.
The AHNJ small group private exchange  MyAHNJ  looks great! AHNJs team is committed to providing their members with cutting edge technology that will give them more choice than ever before and significantly improve their overall shopping experiences. And we are committed to providing AHNJ with the best technology and support to help them reach their goals.
